channel.title: What [PI] Base to use?
channel.description:
I'm not new to coding.... But, im trying to find a good base to use that is a PI
I know this is probably the wrong section, but i couldn't think of another place to put this, so if a mod comes across this, just move it and send me a message of the link to where it is now at :D Thanks..
Post your opinions of what Base you or your friends have used or what base you think is simply the best!

item.title: What [PI] Base to use?
item.dc:creator: @devenb123 devenb123
item.description:
@devenb123 wrote:

[quote=“modzilla, post:3, topic:418624”]dungeonfest 562 is an amazing base to learn. Its newer and more challenging than a crappy 317.

Its way more organized and tutorials will work with it very well.

It takes a little getting used to but in the end it has so much more features than other bases[/quote]

if hes a begginer he should start easy…

Read full topic

item.title: What [PI] Base to use?
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

dungeonfest 562 is an amazing base to learn. Its newer and more challenging than a crappy 317.

Its way more organized and tutorials will work with it very well.

It takes a little getting used to but in the end it has so much more features than other bases

item.description:

Hybrid pvp - most uses it and its have all done so leech as much as you want.
